Name: Chaza 1 Group
description:
Zaynab is the featured borrower of Chaza 1 Group, which consists of three women.

She got together with the other group members to acquire a youth loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua, because they’re all working hard to improve their families’ lives and businesses.

Zaynab is a twenty-two-year-old married mother of three children. She has sold dairy products and worked in the agricultural sector since 2013. She's a hardworking woman, who puts a lot of effort into supporting her beloved family and into improving her business.

For this reason, her loan share will be used to buy seeds and fodder to increase her productivity.

Zaynab is the woman in the middle of the photograph. The other group members are Alaa (the woman on the right) and Safiya (on the left).
